show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
Whether you are a therapist, a client, or a person outside the mental health systemâ€“my guest Gayle Rozantine, PhD is... <!--more--> worth your time and attention.
Gayle and her husband Barry, a psychiatrist, run a stress management and therapy center in Savannah, Georgia.
Her compassionate, carefully thought out approach to understanding and handling stress, as well as underlying psychological issues, is inspiring.
You will benefit from this hour.
